thread.title: Samsung has developed the industry's first 24-gigabit GDDR7 DRAM
thread.title_full: Samsung has developed the industry's first 24-gigabit GDDR7 DRAM

title: Samsung has developed the industry's first 24-gigabit GDDR7 DRAM
text: Samsung has developed the industry's first 24-gigabit GDDR7 DRAM 17 October 2024, 22:45:19 With its high capacity and powerful performance, the 24Gb GDDR7 will be widely utilized in various fields that require high-performance memory solutions, such as data centers and AI workstations, extending beyond the traditional applications of graphics DRAM in graphics cards, gaming consoles, and autonomous driving. In addition to the advanced process node, three-level Pulse-Amplitude Modulation (PAM3) signaling is used to help achieve the industry-leading speed for graphics DRAM of 40 gigabits-per-second (Gbps), a 25% improvement over the previous version. The GDDR7’s performance can be further enhanced to up to 42.5Gbps, depending on the usage environment. Power efficiency is also enhanced by applying technologies that were previously used in mobile products to graphics DRAM for the first time. By implementing methods like clock control management and dual VDD design, unnecessary power consumption can be significantly reduced, leading to an improvement of over 30% in power efficiency. To boost operational stability during high-speed operations, the 24Gb GDDR7 minimizes current leakage by using power gating design techniques. Validation for the 24Gb GDDR7 in next-generation AI computing systems from major GPU customers will begin this year, with plans for commercialization early next year. Related news Some of the latest and most important news related to Samsung or DRAM [The AI-ready Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra and the Galaxy Tab S10+ are unveiled](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/1bc116e3) Samsung Electronics today unveiled the Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra and Galaxy Tab S10+, Samsung's first tablets purposefully built for AI. The premium hardware includes 14.6-inch and 12.4-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X displays — the ideal canvas for the intuitive S Pen bundled with both models. Performance upgrades1 for the Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra include an 18% increase in CPU, a 28% increase in GPU, and a 14% increase in NPU... 26 September 2024 [Samsung Galaxy S24 FE goes official with an Exynos 2400e chipset and a 6.7" AMOLED display](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/353616e2) Samsung Electronics today unveiled the Galaxy S24 FE, the latest addition to the Galaxy AI ecosystem that delivers premium mobile experiences to more users. Powered by the AI-based ProVisual Engine and Galaxy AI’s Photo Assist features, Galaxy S24 FE showcases an enhanced camera setup that empowers users to be more creative. It's the perfect device for gaming on-the-go with a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, a... 26 September 2024 [Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6 and Z Flip6 are here with the new Galaxy AI](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/c7a8169d) Samsung Electronics today announced its all-new Galaxy Z Fold6 and Galaxy Z Flip6, along with Galaxy Buds3 and Galaxy Buds3 Pro at Galaxy Unpacked in Paris. Earlier this year, Samsung ushered in the era of mobile AI through the power of Galaxy AI.1 With the introduction of the new Galaxy Z series, Samsung is opening the next chapter of Galaxy AI by leveraging its most versatile and flexible form factor perfectly... 10 July 2024 [Samsung ISOCELL HP9, ISOCELL GNJ, and ISOCELL JN5 go official](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/43f1169a) Samsung has unveiled three flagship image sensors for mobile devices. Samsung ISOCELL HP9 is the industry's first 200MP telephoto image sensor. It has a 1/1.4" optical format and a 0.56 ㎛ pixel size. This sensor uses a high-refractive microlens developed independently by Samsung Electronics using new materials to improve the light-gathering ability, allowing it to transmit more accurately light information... 2 July 2024 [Samsung Galaxy F55 5G debuts in India with a Snapdragon 7 Gen 1 chipset](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/e230167c) Samsung Galaxy F55 5G has been presented in India. It is an almost exact copy of the Samsung Galaxy M55 5G. The only difference is in the rear shell design, which on the F55 5G is made of faux leather. The colors are also different and, in India, customers may choose from black and orange colors. Everything else is identical. Both the F55 5G and the M55 5G have a 6.67-inch Super AMOLED Plus display with an FHD+... 17 May 2024 [Samsung develops the industry's fastest 10.7 Gbps LPDDR5X RAM, optimized for AI applications](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/0e821662) Samsung Electronics today announced that it has developed the industry’s first LPDDR5X DRAM supporting the industry's highest performance of up to 10.7 Gbps. Leveraging 12 nanometer (nm)-class process technology, Samsung has achieved the smallest chip size among existing LPDDRs, solidifying its technological leadership in the low-power DRAM market. Samsung’s 10.7Gbps LPDDR5X not only improves performance by more... 17 April 2024 [Samsung Galaxy A55 5G and Samsung Galaxy A35 5G are finally official](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/2cce1646) Samsung Galaxy A55 5G and Samsung Galaxy A35 5G were unveiled today with the ambition to expand the brand's latest technologies to a wider audience so that more people can benefit from them. Both Galaxy A55 5G and Galaxy A35 5G offer the incredible photography capabilities that Samsung Galaxy is renowned for, including features such as optical image stabilization (OIS) and video digital image stabilization (VDIS)... 11 March 2024 [Samsung Galaxy M15 5G goes official with a 6.5" sAMOLED display and a 6000 mAh battery](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/aa011645) Samsung Galaxy M15 5G has been unveiled without any special announcement. That wasn't need, indeed, as this device is an exact copy of the Samsung Galaxy F15 5G launched in India last week. The only differences are in the available colors. The M15 is available in Light Blue, Dark Blue, and Gray, while the F15 is available in Grrovy Violet, Jazzy Green, and Ash Black colors. Both models have a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED... 11 March 2024 [Samsung Galaxy F15 5G is launched in India](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/4bfb163e) Samsung Galaxy F15 5G has been launched in India with segment's best sAMOLED display, 4 generations of Android upgrades, 5 years of security updates, and a 6000 mAh battery. Consumers can avail a bank cashback or upgrade bonus of INR 1000. With this, the net effective price of Galaxy F15 5G will be INR 11999 for the 4GB+128GB variant and INR 13499 for the 6GB+128GB variant. The available colors include Ash Black... 6 March 2024 [Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24+, and Galaxy S24 pricing](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/46341621) Here's the official Samsung Galaxy S24 series pricing according to the market Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra all over the world gets the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy chipset. It is priced as follows: 8GB+256GB = €1,450 12GB+256GB = US$1,300 / £1,250 / C$1,800 / A$2,200 / ￥10199 12GB+512GB = US$1,420 / €1,570 / £1,350 / C$1,960 / A$2,400 / ￥11199 12GB+1TB = US$1,660 / €1,810 / £1,550 / C$2,280 / A$2,800 / ￥13199 Samsung... 17 January 2024 [Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24+, and Galaxy S24 offer a new era of mobile AI](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/f9521620) Samsung has just unveiled the Galaxy S24 series for 2024, unleashing new mobile experiences with Galaxy AI. The series includes three models, two of which have two chipset variants: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra - specifications Samsung Galaxy S24+ - specifications Samsung Galaxy S24+ Exynos - specifications Samsung Galaxy S24 - specifications Samsung Galaxy S24 Exynos - specifications AI amplifies nearly every... 17 January 2024 [Samsung Galaxy XCover7 and Galaxy Tab Active5 are unveiled with military-grade durability and advanced 5G connectivity](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/ae8f161a) Samsung Galaxy XCover7 and Samsung Galaxy Tab Active5 are presented, featuring military-grade durability and advanced 5G connectivity. Both devices – along with the Tab Active5’s bundled S Pen – are IP68-rated for water and dust resistance, ensuring a level of durability fit for extreme work environments such as construction sites or retail warehouses. Built to the MIL-STD-810H military standard, the Galaxy XCover7... 10 January 2024 [Samsung Display showcases leading foldable technology at CES 2024](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/f8b01616) Samsung Display showcases a variety of groundbreaking products at CES 2024 that will shape the future of the display industry. One of the most eye-catching products at CES 2024 is the In&Out Flip, a foldable device with a flip-phone design. Its unique in-and-out foldable technology allows it to fold 360 degrees. Unlike traditional in-folding devices that require an additional panel on the outside for displaying... 8 January 2024 [Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2024 will be held on January 18](https://www.devicespecifications.com/en/news/80081605) Another leak by Evan Blass today on Twitter is about the day on which Samsung will unveil the Galaxy S24 trio. The Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2024 will be held on January 18, 2024 at 3 A.M. KST (Korea Standard Time) which is UTC+9. Earlier he listed the official specifications of the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24+, and Galaxy S24, which we have summed up here.
